sense.gloss: parade float decorated with long-handled Chinese spears
negligent, careless, slipshod, slovenly, reckless, irresponsible, offhand
skilled control of a spear, stabbing (someone) with a spear
victim, scapegoat, someone singled out (for punishment, etc.)
sticking to one thing (method, principle, objective, etc.), never deviating from, persisting with, focusing solely on, devotion to, single spear
one's sole talent, one's only forte
spear carrier (for the master of a samurai family)
line of spears held at the ready
to make an example of, to make a victim of, to hold up someone (something) to ridicule, to single out someone for criticism
archery, horsemanship, spearsmanship, and swordsmanship, martial arts in general
archery, horsemanship, spearsmanship, and swordsmanship, martial arts in general
tactics of fighting a technologically advanced adversary with primitive weapons, sole reliance on simple determination (naive spiritualism) in fighting an overwhelming foe
to be made an example of, to be made a victim of, to be exposed to ridicule

k_ele.e: 雨が降ろうが槍が降ろうが

r_ele.r: あめがふろうがやりがふろうが

sense.gloss: come hell or high water, no matter what happens, even if rain or spears should fall
x: 雨が降ろうと槍が降ろうと

k_ele.e: 雨が降ろうと槍が降ろうと

r_ele.r: あめがふろうとやりがふろうと

sense.gloss: come hell or high water, no matter what happens, even if rain or spears should fall
x: 雨が降ろうが槍が降ろうが

sense.gloss: whatever misfortune happens, even if spears fall out of the sky
x: 雨が降ろうが槍が降ろうが・あめがふろうがやりがふろうが

sense.gloss: doing something on one's own without another's help
winning on a tile robbed from another player's kong
keyari, long, feathered ornamental spear carried at the head of a daimyo's procession

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑必↑↓かなら↓ず↑行↑↓い↓きますよ。
sdata.e: I'll be there rain or shine.

sdata.j: ふたりでまじめな↑話↑↓はなし↓をしているんだから、↑君↑↓きみ↓、↑無責任↑↓むせきにん↓な↑横槍↑↓よこやり↓を↑入↑↓い↓れないでほしいんだけど。
sdata.e: Hey, we're trying to have a serious discussion here so I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't butt in so irresponsibly.

sdata.j: あなたは↑槍↑↓やり↓ヶ↑岳↑↓たけ↓に↑登↑↓のぼ↓ったことがありますか。
sdata.e: Have you ever climbed Mt. Yari?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑敵↑↓てき↓↑目↑↓め↓がけて↑槍↑↓やり↓を↑投↑↓な↓げつけた。
sdata.e: He darted a spear at his enemy.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓は↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑行↑↓い↓くつもりです。
sdata.e: I'm going to go tomorrow no matter what.

sdata.j: たとえ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうと↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうと、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑旅↑↓たび↓に↑出↑↓で↓る。
sdata.e: Even if it is raining spears, I'm still going.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: Whether rain shall fall, whether spears shall fall, I will go.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: Whether rain or spears shall fall, I will go.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: Whether rain or spears fall, I will go.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: Whether rain or fall, I will go.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: Whether rain or shine, I will go.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: Come hell or high water, I will go.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが↑槍↑↓やり↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓ろうが、↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑行↑↓い↓く。
sdata.e: No matter what happens, I'll go.
